tha-ap199:0.3_0: Hearing this, the counselor, the senior monks.
tha-ap199:1.1_0: I was very helpful to wander
tha-ap199:1.3_0: Seeing the fruit of the water,
tha-ap199:1.4_0: I recollected the Buddha of the Buddha.
tha-ap199:2.4_0: He taught the path to return.
tha-ap199:3.2_0: the Teacher supreme in the world,
tha-ap199:3.3_0: With the ending of all defilements,
tha-ap199:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap199:5.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap199:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap199:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
tha-ap199:9.1_0: The seventh part of the senior monks had gone.
